definition: an ornament (as on a necklace) allowed to hang free
examples: A turquoise pendant hung on her necklace.

definition: an electrical fixture suspended from the ceiling
examples: hung an incandescent light pendant from the ceiling over the reading area

definition: a hanging ornament of roofs or ceilings much used in the later styles of Gothic architecture
a length of line usually used as a connector on a boat or ship, a short rope hanging from a spar and having at its free end a block or spliced thimble (see thimble sense 2a)

examples: The portrait of his father is a pendant to the one of his mother.
The illustration is an apt pendant to the poem.
